TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWithRepositoryType`1<ParentT>

Docs.summary: A web app source control definition allowing repository type to be specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebAppSourceControl.Definition.IWithGitHubBranch`1<!ParentT> WithContinuouslyIntegratedGitHubRepository(string url) cil managed

Docs.param: The URL pointing to the repository, e.g. https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java.
Docs.summary: Specifies the repository to be a GitHub repository. Continuous integration will be turned on. This repository can be either public or private, but your GitHub access token must have enough privileges to add a webhook to the repository.
Docs.return: The next stage of the web app source control definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebAppSourceControl.Definition.IWithGitHubBranch`1<!ParentT> WithContinuouslyIntegratedGitHubRepository(string organization, string repository) cil managed

Docs.param: The user name or organization name the GitHub repository belongs to, e.g. Azure.
The name of the repository, e.g. azure-sdk-for-java.
Docs.summary: Specifies the repository to be a GitHub repository. Continuous integration will be turned on. This repository can be either public or private, but your GitHub access token must have enough privileges to add a webhook to the repository.
Docs.return: The next stage of the web app source control definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebAppSourceControl.Definition.IWithBranch`1<!ParentT> WithPublicGitRepository(string url) cil managed

Docs.param: The url of the Git repository.
Docs.summary: Specifies the repository to be a public external repository, either Git or Mercurial. Continuous integration will not be turned on.
Docs.return: The next stage of the web app source control definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebAppSourceControl.Definition.IWithBranch`1<!ParentT> WithPublicMercurialRepository(string url) cil managed

Docs.param: The url of the Mercurial repository.
Docs.summary: Specifies the repository to be a public external repository, either Git or Mercurial. Continuous integration will not be turned on.
Docs.return: The next stage of the web app source control definition.
